job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: DURATION: 6 months W2 contractJob Overview:This person will be working with Site Reliability Engineering group. This role may require weekend work based on business needs (deployment, maintenance support, or critical issues).Responsibilities:â¢ Troubleshoots highly complex, intricate technical problems to ensure optimal service levels; works on multiple incidents and/or projects simultaneouslyâ¢ Is viewed as an invaluable resource in the technical and operational aspects of one or more IT disciplinesâ¢I s consulted as a subject-matter expert in areas of technology and technical operationsâ¢ Acts as a point of escalation in complex, critical instances and leads and directs the efforts of more junior staff during high-impact outages.â¢ Utilizes tools to verify and validate that proper thresholds and infrastructure/application information are represented and set appropriatelyâ¢ Investigate incidents and and finds resolutions to insure future stability of infrastructure and data working with geographically dispersed teamsâ¢ Leverages experience and knowledge to proactively engage in root-cause analysis and preventative projectsâ¢ Provides technical expertise in cross-functional and intra-departmental effortsEssential Requirements:â¢ Strong familiarity with Kafka, Mongo DB, Oracle DB support and scripting.â¢ Familiarity with monitoring and analyzing tools like New Relic and Splunk.â¢ Must be comfortable to quickly diagnose and identify root cause to resolve critical issues across multiple platforms.â¢ Strong communication, documentation and organizational skills.â¢ Must be driven to ensure the needed cooperation is obtained from associated/involved teams.â¢ BS degree in computer science or related engineering degree.â¢ 3+ years working in Site Reliability, IT Ops, DevOps or similar functions.â¢ 3+ years of hands-on experience with private/public cloud computing, including infrastructure, storage, and data management.â¢ 3+ years of experience in general programming .Net Core and/or Java.
